info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tyler, northwestern Hardin and central Jasper Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Chester to Alabama-Coushatta Reservation to 8 miles east of Goodrich to near Shepherd. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Colmesneil, Warren, Town Bluff, Wildwood, Spurger, Village Mills, Ivanhoe and Hillister. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
